jobInfo.postDescription:
Responsibility
You constructively operate with a CRM system operation and support for new CRM project initiatives 
Together with your team you work with clients to develop and execute new processes
With a dedicated attitude you support system and process training
Skillfully you work with data analytics and created reporting

Requirements
We assume that you finished your studies successfully
Work experience in consulting is a big plus
We wish hands-on experience with CRM
We are delighted, if you can confidently work with automotive industry
We are delighted, if you are familiar with any programming language (e.g. Python, VBA, Java etc.) and
MS Office
Ability to work independently and in a proactive manner
Based in Shanghai
We appreciate your strong communicative skills
We expect proficiency in English for smooth communication within our international team
jobInfo.address: 上海浦东新区浦东金融广场世纪大道826号12楼

brandComInfo.introduce:
MHP is a leading international management and IT consultancy. We develop pioneering mobility and manufacturing solutions for multinational corporations, mid-sized companies, and disruptive startups. As a premium business and technology partner, we are shaping tomorrow’s digital future, today.

Masters of Digital Transformation.
Our consulting approach is unique, combining holistic IT and tech knowledge with deep expertise in management. This makes MHP the ideal partner for a successful digital transformation. As digitalization experts, we deliver innovative strategies on the basis of strong analysis. These turn your change processes into sustained success.

Over 4,000 employees are driving digital progress in 13 locations worldwide, for over 300 clients. We display excellence at every level.
Exceptional Career Opportunities.
We are growing quickly and offer career opportunities for entry-level candidates as well as experienced consultants.

https://www.mhp.com/en/home/
